title: 1.6 Acceleration Vector
description: In this video, I add an “acceleration” vector to the Mover object and create an example where the object accelerates towards the mouse location. This is the foundation on which I will build for implementing forces in the next chapter!

timestamps.title: Welcome to the last video in Chapter 1!
Acceleration is the change in velocity
The 3 step process to add acceleration

codeExamples.title: Acceleration Vector
codeExamples.description: Creates a mover object that chases after the mouse
